1.content: In the scavenger's market, a new item pops into existence- the swap remote. One of the agents picks it up, and decides to buy it, drawn by a strange call. But who?
1.title: It begins

choices: Swap something between Zephyer or Terminal
Drops the remote, triggering an unaware swap
The swap misses any valid targets
12.content:
Torque picks up the remote and heads back to base, pondering what it could do and just why she bought it. Arriving at base, she spots a few interesting scenes happening- Director Kelly was in a heated phone argument with Bradford, about the importance of her position and peace with the aliens. Meanwhile, Whisper was eyeing her from across the room, hoping to avoid her ire, while Zephyr was training with Terminal.
Her thoughts moved to each group- of the stress her close friend was bearing for her, of her former parole agent, Whisper, and the skills possessed by the sparring pair.
Toying with the remove, she unknowingly activates it, triggering a subconscious swap.
12.title: Agent Torque

choices: Swap rank to become Director Torque
Swap species to become a human
121.content: There were a few things on her mind as the swap activated- of Kelly's rank, her species, or perhaps something more esoteric?
121.title: Swap something with Director Kelly

1211.content:
With a dizzying shift, the remote heated up, she found herself sitting where Kelly was, and Kelly, now wearing combat armor, approaching her.

"Director Torque- how've you been lately?" Kelly asked her close friend.

Torque- confused and disoriented, cloud only reply "Good." as she struggled to figure out what just happened.
Then, it all came to her- she was director. She knew it wasn't real, but the memories she had just gained- they seemed so... solid!

"How about you," Torque continued, regaining her wits, and looking down at the remote.

Kelly then when on to describe her recent life experiences, but Torque was more preoccupied with the remote. This this was weird.
1211.title: Swap rank to become Director Torque

choices: Swap professions with an escort outside
124.content: Dropping the remote, Torque fumbles to catch it, only causing it to land upside-down and triggering a swap.
124.title: Drops the remote, triggering an unaware swap

choices: No- she's still close friends with Director Kelly
Yes- she's now friends with other civilians
Actually, her roommate is now Director Kelly, and they're still close friends
1241.content:
Bending over, Torque picked up the gift from her previous... client. It was warm to the touch. She glanced around, taking in a human in battle armor looking out the window. Must be part of that new 'Chimera Squad'.
Pocketing the device, she started to wander back home- she was done with her 'errands' (and her actual errands) for the day.

Returning home, she greeted her roommate and decided to call her friends to see what was up with them.

But did the swap give her new friends?
1241.title: Swap professions with an escort outside

choices: Whisper is now Ex-Advent while Torque is not
Whisper had commited crimes but been recruited- Torque is still Ex-Advent
Reality just doesn't make sense and noone notices
1242.content:
Picking up the remote, she chided herself for her carelessness, and examined the damage. Luckily, it seemed to be intact- but it was strangely hot.
She glanced around the room. Zephyr and Terminal were still training. Whisper and his close friend Kelly were chatting it up.
Torque thought of recent years, where she was Whisper's parole officer, after the war. She was in charge of making sure the human didn't do anything wrong.

Little did Torque know, this was a produce of the swap. For some reason, she was his parole officer... how did reality change to accommodate this swap?
1242.title: Swap relationships with Agent Whisper

info.brief_description: The swap remote makes it's way into the XCOM universe.
info.description:
Rules of the Remote:
1. The remote can swap anything, be it physical, mental, or even something intangible or vague.
2. Only those touching the remote realize the swap has happened- everyone else is oblivious.
3. The wand will adjust clothing, but not alter it, even if not the direct target of the swap. This keeps the clothing from falling off.

Rules for Chapters:
1. Non-character choosing chapters must be at least a paragraph long.
2. Use proper spelling and grammar.
info.pretty_title: The Swap Remote in Chimera Squad
